commands.name: notion-search
commands.description: Search your connected Notion workspace using the Notion MCP server.
commands.prompt: Use the Notion Workspace Skill and the `notionApi` MCP server. Search the workspace for: {{query}}

commands.name: notion-create-page
commands.description: Create a new Notion page with a title and optional parent.
commands.prompt: Using the Notion Workspace Skill, create a new page titled '{{title}}' under parent '{{parent}}' if provided.

commands.name: notion-database-query
commands.description: Query a Notion database by name or ID.
commands.prompt: Using the Notion Workspace Skill and MCP, query the database '{{database}}' with filters '{{filters}}'. Return structured results.

commands.name: notion-create-task
commands.description: Create a new task inside the user's Tasks database.
commands.prompt: Using the Notion Workspace Skill and MCP, create a new task with title '{{title}}', status '{{status}}', due '{{due}}', owner '{{owner}}', and project '{{project}}' if provided. Ask for database confirmation if needed.

commands.name: notion-create-database-row
commands.description: Create a new row in a specified Notion database.
commands.prompt: Using the Notion Workspace Skill and MCP, create a new row in database '{{database}}' with the provided properties: {{properties}}. Validate required properties.

commands.name: notion-find
commands.description: Quickly find pages or databases by name.
commands.prompt: Using the Notion Workspace Skill and MCP, search for pages or databases that match '{{query}}'. Return titles, links, and types.
